ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course works well as a stand alone course, although being comfortable with basic statistics would be necessary to enjoy it. It offers a new way to look at problems, although is probably less fundamental than some other classes the stats department offers (eg linear modelling).
If he/she wants to learn about information theory, this course is definitely recommended.

I would recommend this course to my fellow friends, and I will describe it as follows: this is a theoretical course that focuses on the underlying theories of the data processing practice. It helps to understand some of the superficial phenomenon by diving deep into information theory.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It helps me to understand the practical works I will handle in future
